The game has a fun learning curve as long as you have friends that can introduce you to the game and help you along the way, otherwise your whole experience will be ruined by russian players that don't know how the game works, regardless of how many hours that they have had combined with them not even trying to speak english. 

The game is a blast as long as you buy prime and play with some friends that are familiar with the game, otherwise you'll be stuck in silver forever.

S cheatery osobně žádný problém nemám a to ani nejsem na Steamu nějak dlouho, jen prostě necheatuju na altech apod.
